MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
Synesthesia Consistency Score (obtained using the color picker test)

Reference:
Eagleman, D. M., Kagan, A. D., Nelson, S. S., Sagaram, D., & Sarma, A. K. (2007). A standardized test battery for the study of synesthesia. Journal of Neuroscience Methods, 159(1), 139â€“145.

SYN_consistency.Description: a consistency score of 1 suggests presence of synesthesia, non-synesthetes usually score around 2 if asked to memorize color-letter association, otherwise around 3

SYN_notes.Description: Notes taken by experimenter examining the response profile
